Articles.Content:
Hi

My Rocket rotates/spins counterclockwise from the start at the launchpad. What could cause this ?

You can see the rotation in the pictures.

[https://imgur.com/a/REm8c#0](https://imgur.com/a/REm8c#0)

Playing 1.02

Thanks for the advice :-)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T17:06:32Z" title="05/02/2015 05:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by ManuxKerb**

Short answer: the new aerodynamics. Here's a video on it:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_q_8TO4Ag0E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Easy. Stick the delta wings on the bottom and THEN stick elevons on those wings. If you engage SAS or MechJeb or whatever, you'll be fine.
Wow i never tried that before! It really worked :-)
